attributes.description:
Welcome to the King of Cars Group

King of Cars has more than 15 years of experience in the motor industry and offers over 200 professionally evaluated vehicles. We offer advice & assistance to clients, from financial solutions to the smart way to buy / sell your vehicle. 

We also offer a ‘Breaking Borders’ approach. We can start the application process online or telephonically, complete the entire sale this way and even deliver the vehicle to your doorstep anywhere in South Africa. We’ll help you make the car of your dreams a reality.  

Contact or visit our showroom today!

Please Note: Administration, delivery and license and registration fees are not included.

attributes.description: At Mahindra East Rand Group we understand how important buying a vehicle is for our customers. All Pre-Owned vehicles are 125 point checked, Serviced and Road Ready. We will design a package around your financial needs. All prices exclude administration, delivery and license & registration fees. Test drives welcome. Finance available through all major banks, subject to Bank Approval. Warranty and Service plans available and all vehicles have Tracker Pre-Fitment. Trade-in’s welcome. T’s & C’s Apply.

attributes.description:
With a fuel consumption of 5.1 litres/100km - 55 mpg UK - 46 mpg US (Average), 0 to 100 km/h (62mph) in 12.1 seconds, a maximum top speed of 102 mph (164 km/h), a curb weight of 2070 lbs (939 kgs), the Spark 1.2 LT has a naturally-aspirated Inline 4 cylinder engine, Petrol motor.
This engine produces a maximum power of 82 PS (81 bhp - 60 kW) at 6400 rpm and a maximum torque of 111 Nm (81 lb.ft) at 4800 rpm. The power is transmitted to the road by the front wheel drive (FWD) with a 5 speed Manual gearbox.
On the topic of chassis details responsible for road holding, handling behavior and ride comfort, the Spark has Independent. McPherson struts. Coil springs. Anti-roll bar. front suspension and Semi-Independent. Coil springs. Torsion bar. rear suspension. Stock tire sizes are 165 / 60 on 15 inch rims at the front, and 165 / 60 on 15 inch rims at the rear. For stopping power, the Spark 1.2 LT braking system includes Vented Discs at the front and Drums at the rear.
 with 5 doors and 5 seats,

attributes.description:
Everything keeps going right TOYOTA - Sportier, fresher Auris
So it looks a lot better, but how does the Auris drive? The answer can be summed up by one word: good. It has a bit of a sporty edge which is great if you are a spirited driver. Toyota?s bullet-proof engine
Very economical and spacious for the whole family. Supporting a reverse camera and heated seats which come fitted as standard. There is also cruise control, keyless entry and start, Bluetooth audio, USB port, touchscreen infotainment system and leather seats. Safety features include seven airbags, ABS and EDB. This one is yours for the taking. With a full condition and roadworthy report from Dekra. Please note the price does not include dealership fees and smash and grab.
